definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: The ultimatum expires at noon tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最后通牒规定的期限到明天中午截止。

sentences.english: This ultimatum was bound to create a grave crisis.
sentences.chinese: 这一纸最后通牒必然会引起严重危机。

sentences.english: They need to give them (Tom Hicks and George Gillett) some ultimatums.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要给高层们下达最后通牒。

sentences.english: Issue an ultimatum -- but be prepared to lose your friends.
sentences.chinese: 发最后通牒，不过你要准备好失去你的朋友。

sentences.english: One side cannot put an ultimatum to another.
sentences.chinese: 一方不可以向另外一方下最后通牒。

sentences.english: Listen as she reprimands him and gives him an ultimatum.
sentences.chinese: 请听卡伦如何斥责他，给他下最后通牒。

sentences.english: An ultimatum from the US to China must be avoided if at all possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要有可能美国就必须避免对中国发出最后通牒。

sentences.english: A proactive teacher doesn't deliver ultimatums .
this week is not the day to try to comer people by giving them ultimatums.
sentences.chinese: 本周不宜给别人最后通牒，为难别人。

sentences.english: After an extraordinary meeting held in Turin the Juventus board have handed Ciro Ferrara an ultimatum.
sentences.chinese: 在尤文董事会召开会议后决定给费拉拉最后通牒。

sentences.english: choose your ultimatums with care and context.
sentences.chinese: 用关心和环境选择你的“最后通牒”。

sentences.english: Environmental groups in Nevada and the Midwest have issued similar ultimatums.
sentences.chinese: 内华达和中西部的环保团体也发布了类似的最后通牒。

sentences.english: They delivered an ultimatum to that country.
sentences.chinese: 他们给那个国家发出了最后通牒。

sentences.english: Both groups then played the ultimatum game as responders.
sentences.chinese: 两组在最后通牒游戏中都扮演回应者。

definition: to lay one's cards on the table
to give orders/to spread news or rumors/to leak certain information intentionally
to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
